name: dark ilearn.eucsyd.dk
description:
A dark theme for ilearn.eucsyd.dk.
Dark webskema.
If you use this, you most likely are interested in the stuff below:
Dark webskema - https://userstyles.org/styles/175682/dark-webskema
Dark sso.itcsyd.dk - https://userstyles.org/styles/175370/dark-sso-itcsyd-dk-login
Dark unilogin - https://userstyles.org/styles/175209/uni-login-dark
css:
@-moz-document domain("ilearn.eucsyd.dk") {
body,
html,
header.navbar .navbar-brand,
.page-header-in-navbar,
div#page div#page-content div#region-main-box section#region-main div.card.card-block,
.list-group-item,

body #page #nav-drawer .list-group-item,
button[data-action="toggle-drawer"],

.dropdown-item:focus,

input[type="checkbox"],

div.course-content ul.topics li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:active a,

div.course-content ul.topics li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:active:focus a,

.tag_feed .media .muted a,
#page-admin-qtypes .disabled,
#page-admin-qbehaviours .disabled,
#page-admin-plugins #plugins-control-panel .pluginname .componentname,
#page-admin-plugins #plugins-control-panel .version .versionnumber,
#page-admin-plugins #plugins-control-panel .notes .requiredby,
#plugins-check-page .page-description,
#plugins-check-page #plugins-check .requires-ok,
#plugins-check-page #plugins-check .displayname .plugindir,
#plugins-check-page #plugins-check-available-dependencies .displayname .component,
.block .minicalendar td.weekend,
.course-content .section-summary .section-summary-activities .activity-count,
#course-category-listings .listitem[data-visible="0"],

.moodle-dialogue-base .moodle-dialogue-wrap .moodle-dialogue-hd.yui3-widget-hd,
.alert-info,
#page-admin-index .releasenoteslink,
#adminsettings .form-overridden,
.que .formulation,
.alert-warning,
#page-admin-index .adminwarning,
.uninstalldeleteconfirmexternal,
.que .outcome,
.que .comment,
body#page-mod-quiz-attempt div#page aside#block-region-side-pre aside#mod_quiz_navblock div.content div.multipages a.qnbutton,
i.fa,
.dropdown-menu > li > a,
button {
	color: white !important;
}

header.navbar .navbar-brand .logo img,
.fp-pathbar .fp-path-folder,
code.cs,
code.css,
code.html,
code.javascript,
code.json,
code.sql,
code.python,
code.xml {
	filter: invert(100%)
}

.nav-tabs .nav-link.active,
.nav-tabs .nav-item.open .nav-link,
.nav-tabs .nav-link.active:focus,
.nav-tabs .nav-item.open .nav-link:focus,
.nav-tabs .nav-link.active:hover,
.nav-tabs .nav-item.open .nav-link:hover,
.btn-default,
.btn-default:link,
.btn-default:visited,
button.btn-default,
a.btn-default,
.page-link,
body #page #nav-drawer,
button[data-action="toggle-drawer"],
aside#block-region-side-pre aside.block.card div.card-block,
.popover-region-container,
.dropdown-menu,
#myconfigbox,
input[type="text"],
.form-control,
.popover,
select,
.initialbar .letter,
.que.gapfill span.draggable.answers,
.que.essay .qtype_essay_response.readonly,
.atto_form textarea.fullwidth,
.atto_form input.fullwidth,
button,
input[type="url"],
input[type="file"],
.fp-iconview .fp-filename-field .fp-filename,
input[type="number"],
.blueborder {
	background-color: black !important;
}

.table-striped tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table.collection tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table#explaincaps tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table#defineroletable tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table.grading-report tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table#listdirectories tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table.rolecaps tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table.userenrolment tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
form#movecourses table tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
#page-admin-course-index .editcourse tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
.forumheaderlist tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
table.flexible tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
.generaltable tbody tr:nth-of-type(2n+1),
.que .info,
div.editor_atto_toolbar div.atto_group,
.atto_charmap_selector button:hover {
	background-color: #444 !important;
}

.editor_atto_toolbar button:hover,
.editor_atto_toolbar button:active,
.editor_atto_toolbar button.highlight {
	background-color: #666 !important;
	background-image: none !important;
}

.btn-default:hover,
button.btn-default:hover,
a.btn-default:hover,
.page-item.active .page-link,
.page-item.active .page-link:focus,
.page-item.active .page-link:hover,
.page-link:focus,
.page-link:hover,
button[data-action="toggle-drawer"]:hover,
.popover-region-footer-container,
.dropdown-item:focus,
.dropdown-item:hover,
.preferences-container .preference-table tr th:nth-child(2n),
.table-hover tbody tr:hover,
table.grading-report tbody tr:hover,
.forumheaderlist tbody tr:hover,
.generaltable tbody tr:hover,
table.flexible tbody tr:hover,
.category_subcategories tbody tr:hover,
table#modules tbody tr:hover,
table#permissions tbody tr:hover,
.preferences-container .preference-table tr td:nth-child(2n),
.ui-state-default,
.ui-widget-content .ui-state-default,
.ui-widget-header .ui-state-default,
.ui-button,
html .ui-button.ui-state-disabled:hover,
html .ui-button.ui-state-disabled:active,
div.course-content ul.topics li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:hover,
div.course-content ul.topics li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:active,
div.course-content ul.topics li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:focus,
div.course-content ul.topics li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:active:focus,
div.course-content ul.weeks li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:hover,
div.course-content ul.weeks li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:active,
div.course-content ul.weeks li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:focus,
div.course-content ul.weeks li.section.main div.content ul.section li.activity:active:focus,
.initialbar .letter:hover,
div.editor_atto_toolbar,
.filemanager-toolbar .btn-secondary,
.filemanager-toolbar div.praxis_cohort_news_archive div.admin-search-container form.praxis-form-inline div.form-group.archive-submit-container input#submit-button,
div.praxis_cohort_news_archive div.admin-search-container form.praxis-form-inline div.form-group.archive-submit-container .filemanager-toolbar input#submit-button,

#page-blocks-progress-overview .block_progress .buttons .filemanager-toolbar input[type="button"],

aside.block_ipraxisedit div.card-block div.card-text.content div.edit-link .filemanager-toolbar a,
.filemanager-toolbar aside.block_comments div.card-block div.card-text.content div.mdl-left div.comment-ctrl div.comment-area div.fd a[id*="comment-action-post"],
aside.block_comments div.card-block div.card-text.content div.mdl-left div.comment-ctrl div.comment-area div.fd .filemanager-toolbar a[id*="comment-action-post"],
.filemanager-toolbar aside.block_blog_menu div.card-block div.card-text.content div.footer form.blogsearchform input[type="submit"],
aside.block_blog_menu div.card-block div.card-text.content div.footer form.blogsearchform .filemanager-toolbar input[type="submit"],
.filemanager-toolbar body#page-mod-quiz-edit div#page div.card.card-block div.mod-quiz-edit-content ul.only-one-section div.last-add-menu div.menubar a.dropdown-toggle,
body#page-mod-quiz-edit div#page div.card.card-block div.mod-quiz-edit-content ul.only-one-section div.last-add-menu div.menubar .filemanager-toolbar a.dropdown-toggle,
.filemanager-toolbar .btn-secondary:link,
.filemanager-toolbar aside.block_blog_menu div.card-block div.card-text.content div.footer form.blogsearchform input[type="submit"]:link,
aside.block_blog_menu div.card-block div.card-text.content div.footer form.blogsearchform .filemanager-toolbar input[type="submit"]:link,
.filemanager-toolbar .btn-secondary:visited,
.filemanager-toolbar aside.block_blog_menu div.card-block div.card-text.content div.footer form.blogsearchform input[type="submit"]:visited,
aside.block_blog_menu div.card-block div.card-text.content div.footer form.blogsearchform .filemanager-toolbar input[type="submit"]:visited,
.filemanager-toolbar button.btn-secondary,
.filemanager-toolbar a.btn-secondary,
.editor_atto_menu .open ul.dropdown-menu,
.btn-secondary:active,
.btn-default:active,
.btn-secondary.active,
.fp-viewbar:not(.disabled) a.checked,
.btn-default.active,
.open > .btn-secondary.dropdown-toggle,
.open > .btn-default.dropdown-toggle,
.yui3-skin-sam .yui3-tabview-panel {
	background-color: #222 !important;
}

.page-link:focus,
.page-link:hover {
	color: #1cb4ff;
}

.progress-chart-container .progress-doughnut .progress-indicator svg .circle {
	stroke: #004A74 !important;
}

.page-item.active .page-link,
.page-item.active .page-link:focus,
.page-item.active .page-link:hover,
input[type="text"],
textarea,
.form-control,
.popover,
select,
.atto_form textarea.fullwidth,
.atto_form input.fullwidth,
input[type="number"] {
	border-color: white !important;
}

.has-danger .form-control {
	border-color: #ff4136 !important;
}

body #page #nav-drawer a.font-weight-bold .circle-arrow-right svg g path {
	fill: #fff !important;
}

.list-group-item.list-group-item-action.clearfix.font-weight-bold,
.list-group-item:hover,
.content-item-container:hover {
	background-color: #829199 !important;
}

.list-group-item,
button[data-action="toggle-drawer"],
.editor_atto_toolbar button {
	transition: all .2s;
}

.popover-region-content-container {
	height: calc(100% - 79px);
}

.popover-region-footer-container,
#myconfigbox[style="POSITION:absolute;LEFT:778px;TOP:100px;line-height:1;WIDTH:354px;HEIGHT:385px;BACKGROUND-IMAGE:url('https://rawfiles.leseweb.dk/popup.gif');COLOR:black;z-index: 200001;text-align:left;"] {
	height: auto !important;
}

#myconfigbox {
	background-image: none !important;
}

#yui_3_17_2_1_1568665986384_73 img {
	display: none !important;
}

#myconfigbox font[style="FONT-FAMILY:verdana;FONT-SIZE:12px;FONT-WEIGHT:bold;line-height:1;"]::after {
	content: "";
	display: block;
	height: 5px;
}

#myconfigbox,
input[type="checkbox"],
input[type="radio"],
.atto_form textarea.fullwidth,
.atto_form input.fullwidth,
button,
select,
input[type="text"],
input[type="url"],
input[type="file"],
input[type="number"] {
	border-radius: 5px;
	border: 1px solid white;
}

input[type="checkbox"] {
	border-radius: 25%;
}

input[type="radio"] {
	border-radius: 100%;
}

input[type="checkbox"],
input[type="radio"] {
	-webkit-appearance: button;
	border: solid 1px white;
	color: #FFF;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	width: 15px;
	height: 15px;
}

input[type="checkbox"]:checked,
input[type=radio]:checked {
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px 3px #333;
	background-color: white;
}

.alert-info,
#page-admin-index .releasenoteslink,
#adminsettings .form-overridden,
.que .formulation {
	background-color: #10384b;
}

.alert-warning,
#page-admin-index .adminwarning,
.uninstalldeleteconfirmexternal,
.que .outcome,
.que .comment,
.que.multianswer .feedbackspan {
	background-color: #8a6d3b;
}

.atto_form textarea.fullwidth,
.atto_form input.fullwidth,
button,
select,
input[type="text"],
input[type="url"],
input[type="file"],
input[type="number"] {
	padding: 5px;
}
}
